value.value: Get a list of topics by ids
Keys must be delimited by coma
Create a topic with the current user
Returns an instance of created topic.
Response is a set containing the ID's of deleted topics.
Deletes a single topic and returns its id.
Shares one or more topics with one or more data owners
List topics for the current user (HcParty) or the given hcparty in the filter
Returns a list of topics along with next start keys and Document ID. If the nextStartKey is Null it means that this is the last page.
Get ids of topics matching the provided filter for the current user (HcParty)
Add a participant to a topic
Add a participant to a topic, returns the modified topic.
Remove a participant from a topic
Remove a participant from a topic, returns the modified topic.
